Text: Emperor of the Sea:  The period drama is based on Choi In-ho's 2003 novel "Hae-sin", which depicts the life of Jang Bogo, who rises from a lowly slave to a powerful maritime figure who dominated the East Asia seas and international trade during the Unified Silla Dynasty.
